entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
